# Portfolio Website Setup Progress

## Project: Interactive Portfolio for Software Developer & Data Scientist

### Technology Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- React

## Setup Complete! 

Your portfolio website is now running at http://localhost:3000

### Next Steps:
1. Customize the content in each component with your personal information
2. Update the experience data in `src/components/Experience.tsx`
3. Add your projects in `src/components/Projects.tsx`
4. Update your skills in `src/components/Skills.tsx`
5. Add your contact information and social links in `src/components/Contact.tsx`
